tickets.title: Protocol Deviation Detection in Network Traffic
tickets.description: Implement automated detection system for protocol deviations in network traffic patterns. The system should identify unusual protocol behavior and generate alerts for security team review.

comments.author: John Smith
comments.body: Started implementation of base detection algorithms. Need to review existing traffic patterns first.

comments.author: Security Team
comments.body: Please ensure the system can handle encrypted traffic and provide detailed logging for compliance.

tickets.title: User Authentication Service Integration
tickets.description: Integrate the new OAuth 2.0 authentication service with existing user management system. This includes updating login flows, token validation, and user session management.

tickets.title: Database Performance Optimization
tickets.description: Optimize database queries and indexing for improved performance. Current response times are exceeding acceptable thresholds during peak usage periods.

comments.author: Mike Wilson
comments.body: Identified several slow queries. Adding composite indexes should resolve the performance issues.

comments.author: Operations Team
comments.body: Performance improvements verified in production. Response times reduced by 65%.

tickets.title: Mobile App Push Notification Feature
tickets.description: Implement push notification system for mobile applications. Users should receive notifications for important updates, alerts, and system status changes.

comments.author: Lisa Chen
comments.body: Push notification service is complete. Currently testing with different device types and OS versions.

tickets.title: API Rate Limiting Implementation
tickets.description: Implement rate limiting for public API endpoints to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage. Include configurable limits per user tier and proper error responses.

comments.author: David Brown
comments.body: Rate limiting middleware implemented using Redis. Testing different threshold configurations.
